sequel server the the instance will go into a modifying state and then for a

you're not allowed to do another scale storage operation until that one
completes so hopefully you're not trying to do scale storage every hour if you
are bump it up a little bit so that you can stay within that you don't have to

pay for the compute resources while your instances stopped all you pay for is the
EBS volume which is still around this is not a substitute for longer term so we
